title: Plumpkin Recipe
full_text:
Plumpkin Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
ripe
black plum
or
pluot
, quartered
1
teaspoon
sugar
1/2
lime
, cut in half
12
mint leaves
2
ounces
white rum
Club soda
Garnish:
mint sprig
Directions
Muddle plum or pluot with sugar into a rough pulp. Add lime and mint leaves and muddle lightly. Fill cocktail shaker with ice, add rum, and shake until very cold, about 15 seconds.
Pour unstrained into 12-ounce serving glass, top with soda and garnish with mint sprig.
Special Equipment
Muddler
,
cocktail shaker
Rum
